Package app.foodpanda.service

Class OrderService

java.lang.Object
app.foodpanda.service.OrderService
@Service
public class OrderService
extends java.lang.Object
The type Order service. Used for saving an order, finding all orders by restaurant and by customer or changing status. of an order.
Author:
Ariana Horvath
